name: Related Celebrities 02 Quiz | Celebrities Mixture | 5 Questions

questions.text: I played that horrid little Willie Olson on 'Little House on the Prairie.' My name is ________ Gilbert ?

questions.text: The man that played the father on 'Little House on the Prairie' passed away July 1, 1991 from cancer. Who was he?
